name: frdl/module
description: Skeleton for `${package.type}` Composer-Package-Type, to be cloned by `composer create project`.

suggest.frdl/cms: A collection of packages recommended for a content management system based on Frdlweb
suggest.frdl/frdlweb-cms-db: Most of the frdl-module/frdl-theme packages require this Database Module
suggest.frdl/nav: Add Navigation Menus to your Frdlweb Project
